content.rendered:
Directed by Bhushan Patel.

Written by Tanya Pathak.

Cast Ali Asgar(Goti). Ali Asgar(Butler). Vivan Bhatena(Sameer). Sabina Chema(Ruhi). Taru Devani(Asha). Navneet Kaur Dhillon(Maya). Nargis Fakhri(Ahaana). Sachiin Joshi(Karan). Noor Lila(Student (as Shabnam Karimzada)). Kevin Matadeen(Student). Mona Singh(Dr. Shivani). Shreya Bhattacharya(Kokila (uncredited))

Language Hindi.

Producers Amit Gupta. Satish Salvi. M.R. Shahjahan. Ssunny Suraani.

Production Simply West Productions.
